TEXT:
Sexuelle BelÃ¤stigung und Gewalt sind fÃ¼r Frauen auf der ganzen Welt Alltag

Die HuffPost will darauf aufmerksam machen, wie viele Frauen schon solche Erfahrungen gemacht haben

Den Anfang macht Kristina, ihre Geschichte seht ihr oben im Video

#MeToo geht um die Welt. Unter dem Hashtag posten gerade Frauen auf der ganzen Welt ihre Erfahrungen mit sexueller BelÃ¤stigung und Gewalt.

Laut der Organisation UNIFEM wird jede dritte Frau mindestens einmal in ihrem Leben vergewaltigt, geschlagen, zum Sex gezwungen oder auf andere Art und Weise missbraucht.

Trotz dieser erschreckenden Zahl, trotz vieler Aktionen zum Thema sexuelle Gewalt gegen Frauen, ignorieren viele Menschen noch immer das Problem.

Deshalb will die HuffPost dem Problem ein Gesicht geben. Frauen haben uns erzÃ¤hlt, was ihnen widerfahren ist. Wir wollen damit darauf aufmerksam machen, wie furchtbar allgegenwÃ¤rtig sexuelle BelÃ¤stigung und sexuelle Gewalt fÃ¼r viele Frauen in unserem Land sind.

"Wieso hat er nicht Ihre Freundin begrapscht?"

Den Anfang macht Kristina aus MÃ¼nchen. Sie wurde vor einigen Jahren auf der StraÃŸe von einem fremden Mann begrapscht. Ihren Eltern hat sie davon bis heute nichts erzÃ¤hlt. Nicht zuletzt wegen der Reaktion der Polizei. Denn die Beamten spielten den Vorfall herunter und wollten Kristina nicht einmal glauben, dass der Mann sie und nicht ihre Freundin belÃ¤stigt hatte - denn die habe doch viel grÃ¶ÃŸere BrÃ¼ste.

Kristinas Geschichte seht ihr oben im Video.

Wenn auch ihr Ã„hnliches erlebt habt und wollt, dass eure Geschichte bekannt wird, schreibt uns eine Mail an katharina.schneider@huffpost.de. Damit helft ihr anderen Frauen, und macht ihnen Mut, auch ihre Geschichte zu teilen - damit sexuelle BelÃ¤stigung keine SelbstverstÃ¤ndlichkeit bleibt.

â¨ Mehr zum Thema: Ich wurde vergewaltigt - das hat das Trauma aus meinem Leben gemacht



(ame)

TEXT:
Coronation Street actor Nicola Thorp has called out Lidl for selling kidsâ€™ pyjamas featuring â€œsexistâ€ messaging about superheroes.

Thorp, who plays Nicola Rubinstein in the soap, tweeted a picture of a girlsâ€™ set of nightwear featuring the slogan: â€œdaddy is my superheroâ€, and a pack of boysâ€™ pyjamas with the slogan: â€œbe your own superheroâ€™.

â€œBoys can be their own superhero but girls need their daddy? These pyjamas should be put to bed,â€ Thorp wrote in the caption.

Oh hey @LidlUK... boys can be their own superhero but girls need their daddy? ğŸ™„These pajamas should be put to bed. pic.twitter.com/lK2TAy1VJy â€” Nicola Thorp (@nicolathorp_) October 20, 2017

When asked about whether the slogans were available on pjs aimed at either sex a Lidl spokesperson sent HuffPost UK the following statement:

â€œBoth of these pyjamas have been popular with customers and were certainly not designed to offend.

â€œCustomer feedback is incredibly important to us and we will ensure that this is taken into consideration for future collections.â€

Lauren Hurley - PA Images via Getty Images Nicola Thorp

On Twitter @munkyfaz said this was â€œblatant sexismâ€ and @Danoosha added:

â€œIn this day and age you are selling stuff like this? Stop.

â€œA boy can be a superhero but a girl needs her daddy to be one for her?â€

Francesca Mallen, lead campaigner for Let Clothes Be Clothes - a group of parents who have come together to ask retailers in the UK to rethink how they design and market childrenâ€™s clothing - told HuffPost UK she was saddened but not surprised to find these pjs for sale.

â€œThis is yet another example of how our high street is imposing harmful gender stereotypes on our kids, and the parents who support us are saying loud and clear - weâ€™re sick of this,â€ she said.

â€œWe would hope a company from our German neighbours would be more enlightened, but making money from sexism is clearly not just limited to UK businesses.â€

Girl: Has self esteem

Lidl: NO! only men are heroes

Girl: But the boy gets PJs

Lidl: You cannot be a hero. No self esteem for you!

Girl: ğŸ˜ â€” SpotlightOnInclusion (@On_Inclusion) October 19, 2017
TITLE: Coronation Street Actor Nicola Thorp Slams Lidl Over Sexist Kids' Pyjamas

En ajoutant Ã  cela des interventions de plus en plus frÃ©quentes Ã  la tribune tÃ©lÃ©phonique diffusÃ©e le soir Ã  la radio et bien entendu les manifestations. Le dÃ©lire quoi. Pour ne pas dire de la pure haine. Car ce n'est pas l'amour de l'autre qui donne naissance Ã  de telles pensÃ©es.

Quand je compare le fait de rÃ©pondre aux commentaires Ã  une arÃ¨ne de gladiateurs, je n'exagÃ¨re mÃªme pas.

Quand je compare le fait de rÃ©pondre aux commentaires Ã  une arÃ¨ne de gladiateurs, je n'exagÃ¨re mÃªme pas. Se vautrer dans les insultes revient Ã  se vautrer dans la boue pour ne pas dire autre chose. C'est salissant et Ã  part de donner un spectacle qui apporte haine et division, cela ne donne rien de positif, rien qui nous fera avancer. Mais on aurait dit que j'Ã©tais la seule Ã  le voir.

Cette pÃ©riode, qui s'est Ã©tendue jusqu'aux Ã©lections qui porteront Philippe Couillard au pouvoir, a Ã©tÃ© Ã©puisante. J'en ai passÃ©, des nuits blanches, Ã  m'obstiner avec l'une, dÃ©battre avec l'autre et ainsi de suite. Je me suis carrÃ©ment usÃ© la santÃ©. Peu de temps aprÃ¨s la prise du parti libÃ©ral du pouvoir, ma santÃ© m'a carrÃ©ment abandonnÃ©e. En quelques mois mon Ã©tat s'est dÃ©tÃ©riorÃ© Ã  une vitesse fulgurante, je ne me reconnaissais mÃªme plus. Et je ne vous ai pas encore parlÃ© de mon moral. Les commentaires venant de ceux qui ont perdu leurs Ã©lections sont passÃ©s du mÃ©pris Ã  une violence inouÃ¯e. Les commentaires Ã©taient tellement violents que ma mÃ¨re ne voulait plus que je sorte de chez moi (aujourd'hui encore) par peur que je me fasse agresser, voire assassiner. J'en Ã©tais rendue au point oÃ¹ chaque fois que mon ordinateur m'avertissait avec un bip d'une nouvelle notification, j'en avais de violentes nausÃ©es. La mÃ©chancetÃ© et le stress que cela me faisait vivre m'ont carrÃ©ment rendue malade. J'ai dÃ» finir par me rendre Ã  l'Ã©vidence, j'Ã©tais arrivÃ©e au bout de mes forces, j'ai dÃ» me choisir et j'ai dÃ©cidÃ© de ne plus ni lire les commentaires, ni y rÃ©pondre.

Vous me demanderez alors pourquoi je remets le couvert aujourd'hui, en lisant vos commentaires et en m'adressant Ã  vous par le biais de mes textes ? Question lÃ©gitime. Cette charte des valeurs, bien que jamais appliquÃ©e, a causÃ© beaucoup de tort Ã  notre sociÃ©tÃ©.

Il y a oui, j'en suis heureuse, beaucoup d'opinions formulÃ©es dans le respect, de questions aussi, auxquelles j'espÃ¨re rÃ©pondre trÃ¨s prochainement. Mais regardez aussi la proportion de commentaires fermÃ©s et combien m'accusent de propagande ! Ce que je dÃ©note de tout cela, c'est qu'il y a un gros travail de communication Ã  faire. Since then, he has travelled the world to cover the news â€“ from the fall of the Berlin Wall and the release of Nelson Mandela, to Barack Obama's inauguration and the earthquake in Haiti.

TEXT:
Coronation Street actor Nicola Thorp has called out Lidl for selling kidsâ€™ pyjamas featuring â€œsexistâ€ messaging about superheroes.

Thorp, who plays Nicola Rubinstein in the soap, tweeted a picture of a girlsâ€™ set of nightwear featuring the slogan: â€œdaddy is my superheroâ€, and a pack of boysâ€™ pyjamas with the slogan: â€œbe your own superheroâ€™.

â€œBoys can be their own superhero but girls need their daddy? These pyjamas should be put to bed,â€ Thorp wrote in the caption.

Oh hey @LidlUK... boys can be their own superhero but girls need their daddy? ğŸ™„These pajamas should be put to bed. pic.twitter.com/lK2TAy1VJy â€” Nicola Thorp (@nicolathorp_) October 20, 2017

When asked about whether the slogans were available on pjs aimed at either sex a Lidl spokesperson sent HuffPost UK the following statement:

â€œBoth of these pyjamas have been popular with customers and were certainly not designed to offend.

â€œCustomer feedback is incredibly important to us and we will ensure that this is taken into consideration for future collections.â€

Lauren Hurley - PA Images via Getty Images Nicola Thorp

On Twitter @munkyfaz said this was â€œblatant sexismâ€ and @Danoosha added:

â€œIn this day and age you are selling stuff like this? Stop.

â€œA boy can be a superhero but a girl needs her daddy to be one for her?â€

Francesca Mallen, lead campaigner for Let Clothes Be Clothes - a group of parents who have come together to ask retailers in the UK to rethink how they design and market childrenâ€™s clothing - told HuffPost UK she was saddened but not surprised to find these pjs for sale.

â€œThis is yet another example of how our high street is imposing harmful gender stereotypes on our kids, and the parents who support us are saying loud and clear - weâ€™re sick of this,â€ she said.

â€œWe would hope a company from our German neighbours would be more enlightened, but making money from sexism is clearly not just limited to UK businesses.â€

Se trata de una zona estratÃ©gica para el trasiego de drogas, pues conecta con Ciudad de MÃ©xico o Puebla, explica el activista Manuel Olivares, del Centro Morelos, mientras estira el brazo para seÃ±alar el camino que tiene a su derecha y que, en un punto, parece volverse uno con la sierra: "Esa ruta nos puede conectar con Zitlala, derecho llega a Copalillo y de ahÃ­ uno puede entroncar hacia la Ciudad de MÃ©xico o Puebla; son lugares muy estratÃ©gicos".

De lo que se trata es de sembrar terror en el enemigo, no hay un cÃ¡rtel que sea menos sanguinario que otro, descuartizan, matan, esas son las razones por las que la lucha es tan sangrienta y tan cruel y que por la que ahora pelean por las comunidades." Manuel Olivares.

La gente ha ido regresando de a poco, pero las escuelas y los centros de salud siguen vacÃ­os; las cortinas de los negocios bajadas y las pocas personas que hay, sÃ³lo caminan, caminan, frenan un poco cuando algo o alguien sale a su paso, otean, se cubren la boca, se sacuden las piernas y siguen.

En Tepozcuautla el panorama es similar.

"PrÃ¡cticamente se ve muy poca gente en las calles por el miedo, a partir de las 5 de la tarde la gente se regresa a su casa, como en una especie de toque de queda autoimpuesto, pero tambiÃ©n demuestra que no le tiene confianza a los militares, porque justo hay una comisarÃ­a ocupada por los militares a unos metros", continÃºa Manuel, quien comanda una MisiÃ³n Civil de ObservaciÃ³n con organismos internacionales a fin de hacer visible la emergencia.

Muchas casas siguen vacÃ­as, el retorno no se ha completado y, probablemente, no se complete; se sabe que muchas familias no piensan regresar ante la creciente prÃ¡ctica del reclutamiento forzado por parte de grupos de la delincuencia organizada.

Lo que antes se entendÃ­a por la lucha por la plaza era la lucha por el mercado de consumo, pero cuando el narcotrÃ¡fico toma tintes empresariales, los fines econÃ³micos de la delincuencia organizada incrementan, aumentan los secuestros, el cobro de piso, la venta de protecciÃ³n, la extorsiÃ³n, empiezan a controlar los servicios pÃºblicos." Manuel Olivares

El tema del desplazamiento por la violencia se da al menos desde hace 10 aÃ±os en Guerrero, explica JosÃ© Raymundo DÃ­az, del Colectivo contra la Tortura y la Impunidad.

"En el estado de Guerrero hay desplazamiento desde hace mucho tiempo, pero ha estado silenciado y ahora en Chilapa se estÃ¡ documentando y tratando de visibilizar estos casos de desplazamiento que se estÃ¡n dando desde 2015", seÃ±ala.

Fue entre el 9 y 14 de mayo de 2015 que un grupo de 300 personas armadas tomÃ³ la ciudad de Chilapa, hubo, entonces, entre 31 y 32 desaparecidos. La gravedad se acentuÃ³ porque los hechos se dieron con la presencia de la GendarmerÃ­a Nacional y el EjÃ©rcito.

De 2015 a la fecha, en Chilapa hay al menos 150 casos de desapariciones y sÃ³lo 14 se han podido denunciar ante la PGR para acceder al fondo de la ComisiÃ³n Ejecutiva de AtenciÃ³n a VÃ­ctimas (CEAV); al resto, las autoridades no les han acreditado la declaraciÃ³n de ausencia, denuncia el Centro Morelos, el cual se ha encargado de documentar cada uno de los casos.

Hemos visto el momento en que Chilapa era un paraÃ­so, llegaba mucha gente de otros lugares a vivir, nadie preguntaba nada mientras uno no se metiera en problemas, era un territorio libre para todos." Manuel Olivares.

ENTRE LA ANARQUÃA Y LA OMISIÃ“N

El desplazamiento en Ahuihuiyuco y Tepozcuautla se dio en "mucha anarquÃ­a, mucho desorden", seÃ±ala Manuel, pues aunque el EjÃ©rcito y la PolicÃ­a Municipal acompaÃ±aron a algunas personas, sÃ³lo las llevaron a la carretera y ahÃ­ las familias "le dieron para donde mejor entendieron", por eso no se tiene certeza sobre su paradero.

"Algunas familias fueron a dar a Chilpancingo, otras a Iguala, otras a Morelos, a diferentes partes del estado y del paÃ­s; eso tambiÃ©n tiene que ver con la desconfianza que tienen hacia el gobierno porque no fueron capaces de unificarse y plantearle al presidente municipal una soluciÃ³n.

"Cuando menos el presidente municipal de Chilapa no es ajeno a uno delos grupos de delincuencia organizada y la gente sabe que si van a presentar una denuncia al Ministerio PÃºblico mÃ¡s tardan en presentarla que el mismo MP que tomÃ³ la denuncia le estÃ© informando al amo, al que le sirva", acusa.

El centro de defensa de derechos humanos es claro en su mensaje, no quieren seÃ±alar a ningÃºn grupo delictivo, pero sÃ­ exigirle al gobierno que haga las averiguaciones previas, que las carpetas de investigaciÃ³n avancen, que "realmente se investigue y que realmente se castigue a los responsables."

El Estado tiene la obligaciÃ³n de garantizar nuestro derecho a la vida, a la integridad fÃ­sica, a nuestro patrimonio y, cuando no es capaz de esto, pues la gente tiene que exigirle. AdemÃ¡s nos enfrentamos a que el EjÃ©rcito ha generalizado la visiÃ³n de que los defensores de derechos humanos, defendemos a delincuentes, eso es muy grave porque tiene que ver con una criminalizaciÃ³n y estigmatizaciÃ³n hacia nuestro trabajo que provoca un linchamiento moral de la poblaciÃ³n hacia nosotros." Manuel Olivares.

CHILAPA Y NUEVE ASESINATOS POR DÃA

De julio de 2013 a la fecha, en Guerrero suman 5 mil personas desplazadas en al menos 30 comunidades de 20 de los 81 municipios que integran la entidad.

Chilapa es una de las regiones mÃ¡s violentas, pero, a diferencia del norte, aquÃ­ la lucha no es por los capos, sino por comunidades pequeÃ±itas, para que trabajen para un grupo y si se van con otro grupo, los matan". Abel Barrera, Centro de Derechos Humanos de la MontaÃ±a Tlachinollan.

Actualmente en Chilapa hay tres retenes militares, es una localidad de 31 mil 157 habitantes, segÃºn cifras del Inegi, y en un dÃ­a pueden ocurrir hasta nueve asesinatos.

Mientras que las desapariciones comenzaron desde 2014, con 19 personas; en 2015, 43; en 2016, 282; y hasta la primera quincena de septiembre de 2017, sumaban 188.

En lo que va del aÃ±o, en el municipio de Chilapa 19 comunidades han registrado hechos violentos, mientras que en Zitlala, siete.

Destaca el Ã©xodo de QuetzalcoatlÃ¡n de las Palmas, una comunidad en el municipio de Zitlala: el 6 de enero del aÃ±o pasado, un grupo armado entrÃ³, asesinÃ³ a seis personas, amenazÃ³ con regresar a matar a los demÃ¡s y la comunidad, cargando a sus muertos, se desplazÃ³.

Suena bastante grave, pero cargaron a sus muertos en una camioneta y todas las familias se salieron.

Hay gente que no soporta el sometimiento de los grupos criminales que los obliga a participar en actividades propias de la delincuencia y terminan huyendo". Manuel Olivares.

SONAR LAS ALARMAS

La maÃ±ana del pasado 19 de septiembre dos cuerpos desmembrados fueron dejados en cuatro bolsas en el barrio San Juan, en Chilapa. Ese mismo dÃ­a, llegaba a la cabecera municipal una MisiÃ³n Civil de ObservaciÃ³n. Ese mismo dÃ­a, mÃ¡s tarde, un sismo causarÃ­a gran devastaciÃ³n en Ciudad de MÃ©xico, Morelos y Puebla.

La MisiÃ³n de ObservaciÃ³n, organizada por la Red Nacional de Organismos Civiles de Derechos Humanos (Red TDT), y en la que participaron las Brigadas Internacionales de Paz (PBI), AmnistÃ­a Internacional, Serapaz MÃ©xico y el Centro de Derechos Humanos de la MontaÃ±a Tlachinollan, buscaba visibilizar los casos y reunirse con el gobernador de Guerrero, HÃ©ctor Astudillo Flores, a fin de emitir una serie de recomendaciones para atender la creciente crisis de inseguridad en Chilapa, sin embargo el encuentro fue pospuesto debido a la emergencia nacional que desatÃ³ el sismo del pasado 19 de septiembre.

La misiÃ³n concluyÃ³ que no hay condiciones de seguridad para las comunidades desplazadas e hizo un llamado al gobierno del estado para garantizar los derechos humanos de las vÃ­ctimas, las comunidades y los defensores de derechos humanos.

Mandan un operativo policiaco para acompaÃ±ar a la misiÃ³n y vemos que esos actores armados lo que hacen es vigilar el trabajo de los defensores y defensoras; falta visiÃ³n de derechos humanos para entender la problemÃ¡tica de las vÃ­ctimas. La forma en que se atiende a defensores y defensoras es colocar en el primer frente al EjÃ©rcito, a la PolicÃ­a.

Hubo tensiÃ³n al llegar a Chilapa, estaba un retÃ©n, es una manera de dar la bienvenida con el fusil en la mano." Abel Barrera Centro Tlachinollan

Para los activistas, la polÃ­tica de seguridad implementada, sobre todo en Guerrero, estÃ¡ siendo causante de la crisis de seguridad, porque consuma mÃ¡s violaciones graves a los derechos humanos, fomenta la impunidad y la falta de acceso a la justicia.
TITLE: Chilapa, el municipio secuestrado: Las comunidades que el narco desplazÃ³

English Pointer Nora was abused in her old life -- so much so that she is now often afraid of people.
But when Elizabeth Spence took her in from a shelter, the dog formed an unlikely bond with Spence's 11-month-old bub Archie.
"If Archie is having a bath, Nora is lying on the bath mat waiting for him to get out," Spence said.
Sometimes, Nora feels comfortable enough to go and play with one of Spence's five other foster pets, or two other children.

TEXT:
Archie and Nora are best mates.

English Pointer Nora was abused in her old life -- so much so that she is now often afraid of people.



But when Elizabeth Spence took her in from a shelter, the dog formed an unlikely bond with Spence's 11-month-old bub Archie.

And the results are beautiful.

Spence told The Dodo that the relationship was only possible because of how "laid-back" Archie is.

"If Archie is having a bath, Nora is lying on the bath mat waiting for him to get out," Spence said. "If I'm nursing him she wants up on my lap, too. If he's going through my cupboards throwing all the dishes on the floor, she'll be there cheering him on."

Sometimes, Nora feels comfortable enough to go and play with one of Spence's five other foster pets, or two other children.

Choose love â¤ #whpdreambig . #rescuecadog #rescuecat #adoptdontshop . Fujifilm XT1 A post shared by Elizabeth Spence (@wellettas) on May 6, 2017 at 7:00am PDT

You can follow Spence, from Canada, on Instagram here.
TITLE: This Abused Dog Was Scared Of Every Person -- Except For One

SUMMARY:
PiÃ¹ la delusione di Mdp, che sperava di riaprire un dialogo con Renzi sulla legge elettorale.
Domani mattina, dopo il voto sulle pregiudiziali, il governo dovrebbe chiedere la fiducia, anzi le fiducie, in aula.
Oggi la nuova fiducia al Senato arriva dopo il caos su Bankitalia che ha prodotto nuove tensioni tra Renzi e Gentiloni e anche tra Renzi e il Quirinale.
Eppure il Rosatellum non si ferma: giovedÃ¬ dovrebbe avere il voto finale del Senato.
In Sicilia e Sardegna il treno di Renzi ci arriverÃ  solo a dicembre.
TEXT:
ROME, ITALY - DECEMBER 12: Former Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi (R) welcomes new Italian Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni (L) at Chigi Palace government office in Rome, Italy on December 12, 2016. (Photo by Riccardo De Luca/Anadolu Agency/Getty Images)

Lo spettacolo si annuncia curioso: cinque voti di fiducia, forse addirittura sei, gli uffici del Senato stanno ancora valutando. MercoledÃ¬, a tamburo battente: uno dopo l'altro, con una scenografia simile per ogni voto ma inedita, almeno in questo ultimo anno di governo Gentiloni. In aula ci sarÃ  la maggioranza meno i 16 bersaniani, che perÃ² saranno sostituiti dai 14 verdiniani di Ala: saranno loro a supplire per assicurare sia i numeri della fiducia che del numero legale. Fuori dall'aula, i senatori di Forza Italia e Lega che usciranno per non dover votare la fiducia al governo e al tempo stesso non intralciare il cammino della legge elettorale voluta insieme al Pd di Matteo Renzi: cosÃ¬ giovedÃ¬ il Rosatellum verrÃ  licenziato dal Senato e spedito al Quirinale per diventare legge dello Stato.

Il tutto tra le proteste del Movimento cinque stelle in aula, fuori dal palazzo e giÃ  oggi in commissione. PiÃ¹ la delusione di Mdp, che sperava di riaprire un dialogo con Renzi sulla legge elettorale. Sia l'uno che l'altro nel pomeriggio abbandonano i lavori della commissione: "Una farsa!".

Domani mattina, dopo il voto sulle pregiudiziali, il governo dovrebbe chiedere la fiducia, anzi le fiducie, in aula. E mercoledÃ¬ dovrebbe essere il giorno clou: fiducie, una dopo l'altra, giÃ  autorizzate. Non serve infatti un altro consiglio dei ministri, vale quello di due settimane fa quando l'esecutivo autorizzÃ² la fiducia sul Rosatellum all'esame della Camera. Fu una scelta voluta da Matteo Renzi con l'avallo del presidente della Repubblica Sergio Mattarella. Il premier Paolo Gentiloni non festeggiÃ² ma eseguÃ¬. Oggi la nuova fiducia al Senato arriva dopo il caos su Bankitalia che ha prodotto nuove tensioni tra Renzi e Gentiloni e anche tra Renzi e il Quirinale. Eppure il Rosatellum non si ferma: giovedÃ¬ dovrebbe avere il voto finale del Senato.

E anzi proprio per questa settimana il premier e il segretario sembrano aver ritrovato un feeling o almeno una quadra senza frizioni: venerdÃ¬ si terrÃ  il consiglio dei ministri per la nomina del governatore di Bankitalia e i rumors di Palazzo indicano come altamente probabile una conferma di Ignazio Visco, il governatore criticato da Renzi e da mezzo Parlamento, difeso dal Quirinale e dalla Bce ma anche da una larga fetta di Pd. Renzi incassa: alla fine con Visco ha un bersaglio in piÃ¹ per la campagna elettorale sul tema 'banche'. Sabato Gentiloni sarÃ  con Renzi alla conferenza programmatica del Pd a Napoli. Cerchio chiuso, almeno per ora, alla crisi tra Pd e governo infuriata la scorsa settimana.

E allora, Rosatellum. L'ultima parola l'hanno detta oggi gli emendamenti presentati in Commissione, almeno a vederla nell'ottica del Nazareno. "E' impensabile affrontare venti-quaranta voti segreti", Ã¨ l'allarme lanciato dal sottosegretario per i rapporti con il Parlamento Luciano Pizzetti. Al Senato i voti segreti sono ammessi solo sul tema delle minoranze linguistiche e sul Rosatellum sarebbero stati 48, a fronte di duecento emendamenti presentati: bastava una piccola modifica per rispedire la legge alla Camera, dove sarebbe stata discussa dopo le regionali in Sicilia, test ostico per Renzi, interessato a incassare subito la nuova legge elettorale per non doverla affrontare da sconfitto seppure in un test regionale.

In questa situazione "la fiducia rischia di essere uno strumento di legittima difesa", continua ancora Pizzetti, per dire che Ã¨ necessaria per mettere al sicuro la legge. "Sono ottimista sull'approvazione della legge elettorale in Senato. C'Ã¨ un'ampia maggioranza in aula favorevole al Rosatellum bis. Credo che sia opportuna la fiducia per evitare gli agguati di chi chiederÃ  voti segreti", dice il senatore Andrea Marcucci, capofila dei renziani in Senato.

E' una scelta che fa contenti il Pd renziano, Silvio Berlusconi e la Lega. Scontenta l'opposizione e anche chi nel Pd sperava di riaprire un dialogo i fuoriusciti che ora sono in Mdp, dopo l'appello al dialogo lanciato da Roberto Speranza domenica scorsa. Renzi blinda la legge e guarda al prossimo passo: come difendersi dagli attacchi che si aspetta dopo la sconfitta in Sicilia, data per probabile da tutti i sondaggi. E' quello il prossimo 'tunnel' che lo aspetta. Non a caso, il suo 'treno dell'ascolto' non farÃ  tappa sull'isola prima delle regionali del 5 novembre, pur attraversando la Calabria a partire da domani. In Sicilia e Sardegna il treno di Renzi ci arriverÃ  solo a dicembre. "Problemi logistici, difficile portare il treno sulle isole", spiegava lui stesso sul treno alla partenza da Roma. Nemmeno per la campagna elettorale per le regionali ci si riesce.
TITLE: Rosatellum senza sosta, cinque fiducie al Senato con l'aiuto di Verdini. Renzi blinda, Gentiloni avalla, Berlusconi e Salvini festeggiano

SUMMARY:
Ah, weight loss.
Some of us might only wish to lose a few kilos, while others may have a most substantial amount to lose for health reasons.
It's fine if one or two meals a week look like this but you can't binge all weekend and expect to lose weight.
Any rapid weight loss will very likely result in it being put back on, sometimes with extra.
The best training for weight lossLucas suggests adding the abovementioned resistance training into your existing exercise routine.
TEXT:
Ah, weight loss. It's one of those elusive motivational wagons which is so hard to stay on. Some of us might only wish to lose a few kilos, while others may have a most substantial amount to lose for health reasons. Whatever the desire, losing weight is hard.

Moreover, there are so many factors that contribute to weight gain, or why you might not be able to shift those kgs. It's more than diet or exercise alone -- it's about a whole lifestyle approach that also involves stress and sleep.

First up, let's look at food.

Common mistakes with diet

"Often I see people going too hard too early with regards to their diet so it is unsustainable," dietician Susie Burrell told HuffPost Australia.

Burrell offers a tailored program, Shape Me, to help her clients lose weight with a customised plan.

"I also see people being way too strict then getting too hungry and binging. People also think it's okay to eat well during the week and they are then binging on weekends. Cutting all carbs then craving them and binging is another big one," Burrell said.

It's fine if one or two meals a week look like this but you can't binge all weekend and expect to lose weight. Sorry.

Instead, Burrell suggest taking a slow but steady approach. Any rapid weight loss will very likely result in it being put back on, sometimes with extra.

"I advise people to have a couple of light days at the start of their journey, eating things like salads and soups to shift fluid weight, then from there to control their calorie intake each day.

"Other tips which really help is to eat most of the days food during the first half of the day then keep dinner small and light. Also, get your steps right up -- Aim for 10,000-12,000 a day. Lastly, factor in a meal or two off each week," Burrell said.

Common mistakes with exercise

While it's now well known that exercise only has a very small effect on weight loss, it can still help and has countless other health benefits. Though doing the wrong thing when it comes to working out can make you feel like you're going nowhere, fast.

"The main mistake people make would be not including any resistance training in their workouts," Ben Lucas, personal trainer and founder of Flow Athletic told HuffPost Australia.

"Studies show that resistance training can help to burn fat for up to 38 hours post workout. This is because larger muscles require more energy and therefore burn more fat. It is also important for bone density which becomes especially important as you age."

Cardio is great but it's best to add strength training to your routine, too.

The next mistake Lucas witnesses is people starting out at full steam and then burning out and giving up a couple weeks in.

"A lot of people when they are starting out go too hard or train too often so they end up getting tired, lethargic and then they stop enjoying it. Start slow, don't burn out, it's not good for your motivation or your health," Lucas said.

He also noticed those that don't have a clear objective, goal or plan tend to fall off the wagon.

"When you are new to training, often you are not in the mindset of having fun straight away. This means that you need another reason to keep you motivated until the penny drops and training starts to become fun for you.

"Having a goal in place gives you something to work towards, such as a half marathon or learning how to do 10 pull ups, and having a plan stops you from walking aimlessly around the gym until you just give up," Lucas said.

The best training for weight loss

Lucas suggests adding the abovementioned resistance training into your existing exercise routine. If you don't have one, it's a good place to start.

"I would include full body resistance training twice a week for 30 minutes week to increase metabolism."

"Also try for two 30 minutes HIIT cardio sessions a week and one 45-60 minute LISS cardio session, which is low intensity, to burn calories. This is a good mix of training that won't burn you out, but will give you all of the variety that you need to get results," Lucas said.

Why sleep is so important

You might be training like a machine and eating right but if you're not getting enough sleep your results will definitely slow. It's been proven that being tired makes you reach for more high-calorie foods.

Make sure you're doing enough of this.

"If you are tired you are more likely to skip the gym, make poorer food choices and of course feel sluggish which is not great for your metabolism and weight loss," Lucas said.

Try to keep your stress levels down

Stress is one helluva thing. Being stressed, even if you can't feel it, can have a negative effect on your waistline as well as other aspects of your health.

"If you are highly stressed from work, you have a lack of sleep or you're overtraining it can increase your cortisol. Cortisol is secreted by the adrenal glands as a response to stress. While it is normal to have cortisol in your body now and then, elevated cortisol disrupts the body's blood glucose control by stimulating glucose secretion," Lucas said.

"This limits the release of insulin which is the hormone responsible for removing excess glucose from the bloodstream and that results in high blood sugar levels. This results in poor glucose control which makes losing weight very difficult as the excess glucose can often be stored as fat."

Don't discount incidental movement

Lastly, try to get your movement up by adding in more incidental exercise.

"Do you have the option of taking the lift or the stairs? Can you walk to the further bus stop? Can you get up every hour to walk to the water cooler. Try to get as much incidental exercise in as possible throughout the day. I would aim to get up and stretch every hour if possible," Lucas said.
TITLE: The Reasons You Canâ€™t Lose Weight

Il y avait un risque qu'ils vous collent une main aux fesses et qu'il y ait des histoires.
[...] Il y avait une blacklist des mecs avec qui il ne fallait pas trop prendre de risques", a-t-elle rÃ©vÃ©lÃ©.

Or ce n'est pas facile, donc tout ce qui peut se dire ces jours-ci va alerter les collaboratrices et les dÃ©putÃ©s.
TEXT:
POLITIQUE - Lors du quinquennat prÃ©cÃ©dent, elle a Ã©tÃ© l'assistante parlementaire de CÃ©cile Duflot quelques annÃ©es aprÃ¨s avoir assistÃ© le groupe Ã©colo au SÃ©nat. C'est avec cette double casquette que Marine Tondelier a pris la parole, dimanche 22 octobre sur France 2, pour Ã©voquer le harcÃ¨lement sexuel qui sÃ©vit Ã  l'AssemblÃ©e nationale.

"Il y a des noms de parlementaires qui circulaient entre collaboratrices, car on savait qu'il ne fallait pas prendre l'ascenseur avec eux. Il y avait un risque qu'ils vous collent une main aux fesses et qu'il y ait des histoires. [...] Il y avait une blacklist des mecs avec qui il ne fallait pas trop prendre de risques", a-t-elle rÃ©vÃ©lÃ©.

Une ancienne attachÃ©e parlementaire Ã©voque la "blacklist de mecs avec qui il ne fallait pas trop prendre de risques"https://t.co/cQPWfuvKlT pic.twitter.com/hptluwanYj â€” franceinfo plus (@franceinfoplus) 23 octobre 2017

L'idÃ©e, confie l'Ã©lue d'opposition Ã  HÃ©nin-Beaumont au HuffPost, n'est pas de donner les noms de ces hommes mais de faire prendre conscience Ã  la fois aux collaboratrices et aux parlementaires de l'ampleur du phÃ©nomÃ¨ne. "La responsabilitÃ© est encore plus grande quand on parle de gens qui votent la loi et qui voteront peut-Ãªtre la future loi sur le harcÃ¨lement. Ces personnes Ã©tant censÃ©es Ãªtre exemplaires, c'est encore plus choquant", affirme Marine Tondelier.

"Chaque fille avait des dizaines d'histoires Ã  raconter"

Elle fait remonter la libÃ©ration de la parole Ã  l'affaire Baupin qui a Ã©clatÃ© en 2016. "A partir de lÃ , c'est devenu un sujet de conversation entre nous et on s'est rapidement rendu compte que chaque fille avait des dizaines d'histoires Ã  raconter. Ce sont des choses auxquelles on ne faisait pas forcÃ©ment attention mais Ã  partir du moment oÃ¹ vous le regardez, vous en voyez plus et Ã§a devient intolÃ©rable car c'est pesant au quotidien", dit-elle. Surtout, explique la jeune femme, cette libÃ©ration de la parole est nÃ©cessaire car elle va permettre de mettre un terme aux "blagues sexistes qui finissent Ã  force de banalisation par dÃ©boucher sur des choses beaucoup plus graves".

"On ne doit pas obliger les femmes Ã  parler", conclut-elle, mais s'il faut tirer une morale de l'affaire Baupin, c'est celle-ci. "Les suites judiciaires se sont arrÃªtÃ©es Ã  cause de la prescription donc il faut parler le plut tÃ´t possible. Or ce n'est pas facile, donc tout ce qui peut se dire ces jours-ci va alerter les collaboratrices et les dÃ©putÃ©s. Donc on peut espÃ©rer qu'il y aura moins d'agression mais aussi que la parole des victimes sortira plus vite et que les condamnations seront possibles rapidement".

Ã€ voir Ã©galement sur Le HuffPost:
TITLE: HarcÃ¨lement: Cette ex-assistante parlementaire rÃ©vÃ¨le l'existence d'une "blacklist" de dÃ©putÃ©s

MÃ¼llers Fall, den die Betroffene ausfÃ¼hrlich in einem Blog-Beitrag fÃ¼r die HuffPost schildert, spiegelt die LebensrealitÃ¤t fast jedes zweiten Alleinerziehenden wieder.
Klar ist aus ihrer Sicht: "Auch generell ist die Zahl der Alleinerziehenden gestiegen."
"Und sie beweisen tagtÃ¤glich, dass sie Mehrfachbelastungen stemmen kÃ¶nnen", bemerkt Zimmermann.

TEXT:
Aktuelle Zahlen zeigen: Das Armutsrisiko bei Alleinerziehenden hat sich in den letzten zehn Jahren erhÃ¶ht

VerbÃ¤nde kritisieren, die Regierung ignoriere Verfassungsvorgaben "kontinuierlich"

Michaela MÃ¼ller* hat ihren Glauben, dass es gerecht in Deutschland zugeht, schon lange verloren.

Sie ist alleinerziehende Mutter, arbeitet Vollzeit im Callcenter eines deutschen GroÃŸkonzerns in Brandenburg - und kann dennoch mit ihrem spÃ¤rlichen Gehalt gerade einmal ihre Fixkosten decken.

MÃ¼llers Fall, den die Betroffene ausfÃ¼hrlich in einem Blog-Beitrag fÃ¼r die HuffPost schildert, spiegelt die LebensrealitÃ¤t fast jedes zweiten Alleinerziehenden wieder.

Ihr Armutsrisiko hat sich nach einem Bericht der "SaarbrÃ¼cker Zeitung" in den letzten Jahren spÃ¼rbar erhÃ¶ht. 2016 verfÃ¼gten 43,6 Prozent dieser BevÃ¶lkerungsgruppe Ã¼ber entsprechend geringe EinkÃ¼nfte. Im Jahr 2005 lag der Anteil noch bei 39,3 Prozent.

In regelmÃ¤ÃŸigen AbstÃ¤nden empÃ¶ren sich zwar Politiker Ã¼ber die MissstÃ¤nde, Ã¤ndern tut sich bislang nichts - im Gegenteil. Dabei wÃ¼rde es laut VerbÃ¤nden bereits helfen, die bestehende Rechtssprechung konsequent umzusetzen.

â¨ Mehr zum Thema: "Kinderarmut ist in Deutschland ein Dauerzustand": Laut einer Studie soll jedes fÃ¼nfte Kind betroffen sein

"Mindestlohn reicht nicht einmal fÃ¼r einen Erwachsenen"

Die "SaarbrÃ¼cker Zeitung" beruft sich fÃ¼r seine Angaben auf aktuelle Daten der Bundesregierung, die die Sozialexpertin der Linksfraktion, Sabine Zimmermann, abgefragt hatte.

Alarmierend: Demnach war auch deutlich mehr als jeder dritte Alleinerziehenden-Haushalt mit minderjÃ¤hrigen Kindern auf Hartz IV angewiesen. Der Anteil lag bei 36,9 Prozent. In absoluten Zahlen waren das 606.000 - knapp 42.000 mehr als 2005.

Erika Biehn ist vom steigenden Armutsrisiko bei Alleinerziehenden nicht Ã¼berrascht. Die Bundesvorsitzende des Verbands alleinerziehender MÃ¼tter und VÃ¤ter (VAMV) sagt der HuffPost: "Diese Entwicklung basiert maÃŸgeblich auf zwei Faktoren: Einerseits hat die BeschÃ¤ftigung im Niedriglohn- und Mindestlohnsektor erheblich zugenommen. Andererseits kÃ¶nnen Alleinerziehende keinen Vollzeitjob aufnehmen ohne adÃ¤quate Kinderbetreuung."

Klar ist aus ihrer Sicht: "Auch generell ist die Zahl der Alleinerziehenden gestiegen."

Um die Probleme zu lÃ¶sen, fordert Biehn - wie auch Linken-Politikerin Zimmermann - vor allem zwei MaÃŸnahmen:

â–º Die Kinderbetreuung muss ausgebaut werden - "sowohl in der Breite als auch zeitlich", erklÃ¤rt Biehn. "Allein damit wÃ¤re vielen geholfen, sodass sie ihre Ausbildung beenden oder lÃ¤nger arbeiten kÃ¶nnen - damit kÃ¶nnten sie sich selbst aus der Armut befreien."

â–º "Zudem muss der Mindestlohn adÃ¤quat erhÃ¶ht werden. 8,84 Euro pro Stunde reichen nicht einmal fÃ¼r einen einzigen Erwachsenen", betont die VAMV-Chefin.

Regierung ignoriert die Verfassungsvorgaben

Der Deutsche Familienverband macht zudem noch ein anderes Problem aus. Bereits 2001 hatte das Bundesverfassungsgericht entschieden, dass es mit dem Grundgesetz nicht zu vereinbaren ist, dass diejenigen, die Kinder erziehen und betreuen mit demselben Geldbeitrag in der Sozialversicherung belastet werden, wie diejenigen, die keine aktive Verantwortung fÃ¼r Kinder tragen.

Doch weil die Regierung die Verfassungsvorgaben "kontinuierlich ignoriert", wie Siegfried Stresing, VizeprÃ¤sident des Deutschen Familienverbandes, erklÃ¤rt, "sehen sich die meisten Eltern trotz harter Arbeit nicht in der Lage, ihre Kinder mindestens oberhalb der Grenze des existenzminimalen Lebensstandards zu erziehen."

Stresing fordert daher einen Kinderfreibetrag in der Kranken-, Pflege- und Rentenversicherung.

â¨ Mehr zum Thema: So rÃ¼cksichtslos werden Alleinerziehende auf dem Arbeitsmarkt diskriminiert

"Bundesregierung tut nichts"

Weitere HÃ¼rden warten in der freien Wirtschaft. "Alleinerziehende haben es besonders schwer auf dem Arbeitsmarkt", erklÃ¤rte Linken-Politikerin Zimmermann der "Westdeutsche Zeitung".

Dabei seien diese zumeist gut ausgebildet. "Und sie beweisen tagtÃ¤glich, dass sie Mehrfachbelastungen stemmen kÃ¶nnen", bemerkt Zimmermann.

Buchautorin Christine Finke kennt die Probleme. In einem Beitrag fÃ¼r die HuffPost betont sie: "Ich bin nicht arm, weil ich faul bin. Sondern weil mich keiner mehr einstellt, aus Angst, dass ich wegen kranker Kinder stÃ¤ndig fehle."

Michaela MÃ¼ller klagt, "die Bundesregierung tut nichts, um diesen Zustand (der Armut bei Alleinerziehenden) zu Ã¤ndern".

Offen bleibt, ob eine mÃ¶gliche Jamaika-Koalition dies Ã¤ndern wird. Linken-Chefin Katja Kipping zeigte sich am Montag skeptisch, immerhin gaben die GrÃ¼nen aber vor, etwas fÃ¼r die AbgehÃ¤ngten und gegen die Armut zu tun. "Das muss in SondierungsgesprÃ¤chen eine zentrale Rolle spielen", hatte Fraktionschefin Katrin GÃ¶ring-Eckardt in der vergangenen Woche betont.

"Das ist ein Anspruch, den wir haben an dieses BÃ¼ndnis. Das ist ein Anspruch, von dem wir auch gar nicht abgehen kÃ¶nnen und wollen." Wenn die GrÃ¼nen mitregieren, wollten sie nicht in vier Jahren noch sagen mÃ¼ssen: "2,5 Millionen Kinder leben in Armut und alleinerziehend zu sein, ist ein Armutsrisiko."

Ein hehres Ziel. Daran werden sich nicht nur die GrÃ¼nen messen lassen.

* Michaela MÃ¼ller mÃ¶chte anonym bleiben, deshalb wurde der Name von der Redaktion geÃ¤ndert.

(lp)

SUMMARY:
When it comes to mental health, having a healthy sense of self esteem is important.
"If you don't have self esteem you don't respect yourself, you don't value yourself.
According to Gordon, the reasons behind low self esteem vary, and can be due to past or current circumstances.
"Sometimes people's self esteem is low because they have a childhood in which they haven't been valued," she said.
There are actually actions you can take to help boost your self esteem and get back on track.
TEXT:
Self esteem is feeling good enough about yourself to depend on your own opinions and judgment.

When it comes to mental health, having a healthy sense of self esteem is important. Of course it's probably not a good idea to have the kind of self love that Kanye reserves for Kanye, but having a generally positive view about yourself and what you have to contribute is a good place to be in.

In fact, according to clinical psychologist and director of Armchair Psychology, Amanda Gordon, having good self esteem is key to how you make decisions and interact with society.

"Self esteem is about feeling good about yourself. It's about treating yourself with respect," Gordon told HuffPost Australia. "It implies knowledge of who you are. You have to have a sense of your own self.

"Self esteem is feeling good enough about yourself to depend on your own opinions and judgment."

However not everybody is blessed with a healthy sense of self. Symptoms of low self esteem include hating or disliking yourself, feeling that you're worthless, blaming yourself for things that aren't your fault, an inability to recognise your strengths and indecisiveness.

"People with low self esteem tend to go along with the pack," Gordon said. "They don't believe their own opinion.

"If you don't have self esteem you don't respect yourself, you don't value yourself. Ultimately it means you put your own happiness last."

According to Gordon, the reasons behind low self esteem vary, and can be due to past or current circumstances.

"Sometimes people's self esteem is low because they have a childhood in which they haven't been valued," she said. "Or times in their life where they haven't been valued.

"Sometimes you have to go back and re-frame what happened in an earlier part of your life.

"In other circumstances, people have been hurt by what has been going on in a more current situation. So for instance, your self esteem can be impacted if you have been bullied. Or if for some reason you are not successful in your job or something you have continuously been working towards."

Whatever the reason, it's (thankfully) not a rut you have to stay in forever. There are actually actions you can take to help boost your self esteem and get back on track.

Appreciate the little things.

First off? Take a look around and notice the positive things in your world.

"I think I'd start off by bouncing off the good things around me," Gordon said. "Ask yourself, 'what's a good thing that's happened to me today? What's something joyful in my life?'"

While Gordon also states positive affirmations can be helpful, she says they only go so far.

"Affirmations are good but they need to be contextualised," she said. "It's unlikely that, on their own, they are everything that is needed."

In fact some psychologists recommend avoiding them altogether.

"Positive affirmations are like empty calories. You can tell yourself you're great but if you don't really believe it, your mind will reject the affirmation and make you feel worse as a result," psychologist and author Guy Winch wrote for Psychology Today.

"Affirmations only work when they fall within the range of believability, and for people with low self-esteem, they usually don't."

Step outside of your comfort zone.

The best thing to do to get your self esteem on track, according to Gordon, is to take a risk. This in itself is a bit of a catch 22 because it's likely to be the last thing someone with low self esteem feels like doing, but Gordon says it's important to persevere.

"I think taking a risk and trying something and surviving it would be the best thing to do," she said. "It makes it less about being successful and more about just doing.

"Move outside yourself. Try doing something for other people. Take risks. Try something new.

"It's about measuring success in different ways than the ways you have in the past."

Finally, if you find you're really not coping and are unable to view yourself in a positive light, Gordon recommends seeking professional help.

"If you find your low self esteem is holding you back, so perhaps you're not taking risks for your career or don't believe you're good enough to go on a date with someone who has asked you, I would see a psychologist," she said. "There are so many things we can do to support you. It doesn't mean you have to be in therapy forever. But it could help you facilitate your journey."
TITLE: How To Boost Your Self Esteem

Der AfD-Landschef steht mit dem RÃ¼cken zur Wand - Junge kann den Parteitag nicht verschieben. â€œEine andere LokalitÃ¤t noch in diesem Jahr zu finden wÃ¤re aussichtslosâ€, schreibt er. AuÃŸerdem muss der Parteitag noch dieses Jahr stattfinden, das schreibt die Satzung vor.

Deswegen und durch den Richtungsstreit, der in der AfD tobt, â€œkÃ¶nnten sich selbst die kleinsten Formfehler bitter rÃ¤chenâ€, sagt der Politologe Werner Patzelt von der TU Dresden.

Denn VorstÃ¤nde, die ihre formalen Pflichten nicht erfÃ¼llen, â€œmachen sich angreifbarâ€, sagt er. â€œDas machen sich interne Gegner zu Nutze, die sich in der Partei gegen die FÃ¼hrung durchsetzen wollen.â€

Offene Revolte in Bingen?

Auch in Rheinland-Pfalz gibt es einen rechten FlÃ¼gel, der Junge am liebsten stÃ¼rzen wÃ¼rde - er wirbt fÃ¼r eine gemÃ¤ÃŸigten Kurs, galt bis zu Petrys Weggang als Vertrauter der damaligen Parteichefin.

Weil auf dem angesetzten Parteitag auch der Landesvorstand gewÃ¤hlt werden muss, kÃ¶nnten Junges Gegner in Bingen zur offenen Revolte blasen.

Dass das mÃ¶glicherweise kurz bevorsteht, zeigte sich schon wenige Minuten, nachdem Junge die Einladung zum Parteitag verschickte.

In internen Chats sollen AfD-Mitglieder damit gedroht haben, den Parteitag â€œplatzen zu lassenâ€ - theoretisch ist jeder Beschluss aufgrund der versÃ¤umten Frist angreifbar.

"FÃ¼r eine LÃ¶sung braucht es guten Willen, den es nicht gibt"

Mit schweren VorwÃ¼rfen meldete sich auch die Landes-Vizechefin Christiane Christen zu Wort.

Sie hatte sich Mitte des Jahres aus dem Landesverband zurÃ¼ckgezogen, nachdem ihre Bewerbung auf die Spitzenkandidatur zur Bundestagswahl gescheitert war. Auch Junges FÃ¼hrungsstil hatte sie kritisiert.

In einer wÃ¼tenden Mail schrieb sie nun, dass sie die abgelaufene Frist nicht zu verantworten habe.

Mehr noch: â€œDa meine eingescannte Unterschrift OHNE MEIN WISSEN unter diesen Brief gesetzt wurde, ist mir wichtig, klarzustellen, dass ich mit dieser Einladung nichts zu tun habe und auch die abgelaufene Frist nicht verantworte. Ich bin nicht sicher, ob das schon UrkundenfÃ¤lschung ist, werde das aber prÃ¼fen lassenâ€, heiÃŸt es in der Mail, die der HuffPost vorliegt.

Wie der Landesverband aus dem Schlamassel rauskommen will, lÃ¤sst sich bislang nicht sagen.

â€œDafÃ¼r braucht es guten Willen der Mitgliederâ€, sagt Politologe Patzelt. â€œDer ist aber derzeit nicht zu erkennen.â€

Eine Anfrage der HuffPost an Junge und Christen blieb bislang unbeantwortet.

(mf)
TITLE: Interne AfD-Mails: In Rheinland-Pfalz droht der Partei offenbar die nÃ¤chste Spaltung

E quanti sollevavano qualche perplessitÃ  sull'efficacia di uno schema che prevedesse Salvini prima scelta per Palazzo Chigi, hanno compreso che non Ã¨ piÃ¹ il caso di perseverare con questo pensiero.
Per loro il segnale, chiarissimo, Ã¨ arrivato dalla conferenza stampa in cui Salvini ha commentato nella sede della Lega i risultati della consultazione.

TEXT:
"I tempi sono cambiati". Stefano Candiani, senatore leghista di Busto Arsizio, declina i risultati dei referendum di domenica come se fossero una formula magica, e alla fine emette la propria sentenza inappellabile. Ma del significato del voto, prima ancora che il Governo, per Candiani dovranno prendere atto gli alleati storici, in particolare quei forzisti che in piÃ¹ di 20 anni non hanno mai pensato di poter mettere in discussione la primazia berlusconiana del centrodestra. "Un'alleanza a trazione leghista", osserva, "non puÃ² e non deve piÃ¹ essere considerata un tabÃ¹". Come lui, chi in modo piÃ¹ esplicito chi piÃ¹ sfumato, all'interno del Carroccio ormai la pensano tutti. E quanti sollevavano qualche perplessitÃ  sull'efficacia di uno schema che prevedesse Salvini prima scelta per Palazzo Chigi, hanno compreso che non Ã¨ piÃ¹ il caso di perseverare con questo pensiero.

Per loro il segnale, chiarissimo, Ã¨ arrivato dalla conferenza stampa in cui Salvini ha commentato nella sede della Lega i risultati della consultazione. Lo ha fatto dopo avere intrattenuto un breve colloquio col governatore della Lombardia, che Ã¨ poi rimasto in sede e ha assistito all'incontro coi giornalisti "giÃ  in avanzato stato di normalizzazione", come ha ironizzato qualche maligno, riferendosi ai dissidi del passato sulla svolta nazionale del segretario.

Archiviata per il momento la querelle interna tra Nordisti e Nazionalisti, nella quale Zaia, coerentemente al suo stile, non ha preso e non prenderÃ  posizione concentrandosi sulla trattativa con lo Stato centrale per la propria regione, la nuova frontiera, per la Lega, si chiama Rosatellum bis. O meglio, trattativa sulle candidature in quel 36 per cento di collegi uninominali previsti dalla nuova legge elettorale. Il via libera definitivo dovrebbe arrivare mercoledÃ¬ sera. Da quel momento sarÃ  ufficialmente aperto il contenzioso tra Lega e Forza Italia su come dovranno essere riempite le caselle dei collegi centro-settentrionali. Ed Ã¨ giÃ  evidente come l'intenzione dei leghisti sarÃ  quella di far pesare sul tavolo i cinque milioni e mezzo di voti espressi dagli elettori lombardo-veneti a favore della devolution nei propri territori.

Nelle ultime ore, tutte le dichiarazioni rilasciate dai big azzurri, a partire dallo stesso Berlusconi, sembrano studiate in funzione di questo appuntamento, e cercano di evidenziare un ruolo attivo e decisivo di Forza Italia nel raggiungimento del risultato. Proprio prevedendo tale esito, l'ex-Cavaliere si era cautelato presenziando a un'iniziativa di sostegno al referendum lombardo, invitato non a caso da Maroni. Ma Berlusconi, osservano quasi beffardamente a via Bellerio, sa benissimo che un conto sono le dichiarazioni e altro la percezione del risultato, che Ã¨ indiscutibilmente appannaggio della Lega, in primis di Zaia.

Il plenipotenziario di Salvini su queste faccende, Giancarlo Giorgetti, sta giÃ  lavorando alla road-map che metterÃ  tutti attorno a un tavolo: i due leader avrebbero dovuto vedersi giÃ  questa settimana, ma il rush finale della campagna elettorale siciliana dovrebbe rimandare tutto a dopo il 5 novembre, anche perchÃ© Salvini partirÃ  per l'isola il 29. In quell'incontro, si designeranno le rispettive delegazioni e e si inizierÃ  a ragionare sul metodo da seguire, sia per il programma che per le candidature. Sul primo punto, nel Carroccio l'imperativo Ã¨ quello di ancorare Berlusconi ai suoi alleati, visto che l'ipotesi del governissimo assieme a Renzi viene considerata tanto verosimile quanto deleteria.

Ed Ã¨ in quest'ottica, come osserva Giorgetti conversando con l'Huffpost, che quanto accaduto domenica in Veneto e in Lombardia dovrÃ  costituire una sorta di garanzia sulla prossima legislatura, perchÃ© "cinque milioni e mezzo di elettori non possono essere presi in giro proprio dal centrodestra". Entro questa settimana, inoltre, dovrebbe essere convocato un Consiglio federale della Lega, in cui si analizzerÃ  il risultato del referendum e, verosimilmente, si cominceranno ad affilare le armi per il confronto con Berlusconi e i suoi.
TITLE: Lega all'incasso da Silvio

The pair will take on the roles of Yasmin and Ryan in the 2018 series, which sees former â€˜Broadchurchâ€™ star Jodie take over from current Doctor Peter Capaldi.

TEXT:
Bradley Walsh has officially joined the cast of â€˜Doctor Whoâ€™ as one of three new companions for Jodie Whittakerâ€™s incarnation of the Time Lord.

The â€˜Chaseâ€™ presenter, who was previously rumoured to be joining the BBC sci-fi drama, will play Graham, and will be joined in the Tardis newcomers Mandip Gill and Tosin Cole.

The pair will take on the roles of Yasmin and Ryan in the 2018 series, which sees former â€˜Broadchurchâ€™ star Jodie take over from current Doctor Peter Capaldi.

BBC Mandip Gill, Bradley Walsh, Jodie Whittaker and Tosin Cole

It has also been annoucned Sharon D Clarke will also have a recurring role in the show, but details of her character are yet to be revealed.

Of joining â€˜Doctor Whoâ€™, Bradley said in a statement: â€œI remember watching William Hartnell as the first Doctor. Black and white made it very scary for a youngster like myself. I was petrified but even though Iâ€™d watch most of it from behind the sofa through my fingers, I became a fan.

â€œI then queued up for ages to get into the Carlton picture house in Watford to watch the great Peter Cushing appear as the Doctor in a full length feature film made in glorious colour.

â€œAm I thrilled to be part of this whole ground breaking new dawn for the Doctor?? Oh yes!â€

PA Archive/PA Images Sharon D Clarke is also joining the show

Mandip also said: â€œI am over the moon to be joining the â€˜Doctor Whoâ€™ family. This is an iconic show with an amazing fanbase and I look forward to everything that brings.

â€œCertain roles seem unattainable and this is one of those, so much so I didnâ€™t believe it to be true for the first few weeks.

â€œTo be working alongside the likes of Jodie, Bradley and my old friend Tosin is thrilling. This show is worlds away from the work Iâ€™ve done previously and thatâ€™s the part that excites me the most.â€

Tosin added: â€œIâ€™m grateful and excited to be a part of this journey with the team. Iâ€™m looking forward to jumping in this â€˜Doctor Whoâ€™ universe.â€

Lead star Jodie described the new line-up as a â€œdream teamâ€, while new showrunner Chris Chibnall, who is taking over from the departing Steven Moffat also said he was â€œthrilledâ€ to welcome the trio aboard.

BBC Jodie will take over from Peter Capaldi as The Doctor

The three new stars replace former companion Bill Potts, who was played by Pearl Mackie.

The character only lasted one series, having joined the show last year, but will return for this yearâ€™s Christmas special to mark Peterâ€™s last story as the Doctor.

The new series will then kick of in autumn next year, with a 10 episode run.

It was previously claimed Chris is planning a number of other changes to the show, including a redesigned Tardis and a new-look Sonic Screwdriver.

'Doctor Who' Celebrity Appearances
TITLE: 'Doctor Who': New Companions Revealed As Bradley Walsh, Mandip Gill and Tosin Cole

TEXT:
SPOILERS: si no quieres saber nada de lo que pasa en el primer capÃ­tulo de la octava temporada de The Walking Dead, no sigas leyendo.

"Â¡Psst! Â¡Psssssst! Â¿QuÃ© demonios estÃ¡ pasando?".

Eso parece que le estÃ¡ diciendo Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) a Maggie (Lauren Cohan) en el estreno de la octava temporada de The Walking Dead.

GENE PAGE/AMC

En un episodio repleto de saltos temporales como el capÃ­tulo nÃºmero 100 de The Walking Dead, el primero de la octava temporada, cuesta no perderse en ciertos momentos. Y, pese a la incertidumbre de no saber bien quÃ© estÃ¡ pasando en algunas partes, no ha defraudado.

Rick se pasÃ³ gran parte de la temporada pasada siendo una sombra de sÃ­ mismo, pero ahora por fin ha vuelto a dar un paso al frente para liderar a su gente, junto con sus aliados de Hilltop y el Reino, en un asalto a la fortaleza de Negan y los Salvadores, hasta el punto de lograr que Negan a duras penas logre ponerse a salvo.

Y no le hizo demasiada gracia.

El estreno de la octava temporada les ha dado a los fans varios motivos por los que alegrarse tras la crudeza y desolaciÃ³n exhibida en la anterior. Daryl (Norman Reedus), que acabÃ³ humillado por los Salvadores, alimentÃ¡ndose a base de comida de perro, ha vuelto a montar en su moto, volando cosas por los aires, quizÃ¡s un guiÃ±o de los creadores de la serie a los fans: "AquÃ­ tenÃ©is. Lamentamos lo ocurrido".

Sin embargo, han quedado varias dudas sin resolver:

Â¿QuiÃ©n es ese hombre y por quÃ© cita Rick sus palabras?

Al comienzo del capÃ­tulo, Carl Grimes (Chandler Riggs) aparece conduciendo una furgoneta en busca de gasolina. Esa escena es una recreaciÃ³n, a modo de homenaje, de la escena inicial que protagoniza su padre en el primerÃ­simo episodio de The Walking Dead.

En el trayecto, Carl se topa con un personaje misterioso (representado por el actor Avi Nash), que estÃ¡ escondido tras unos coches abandonados suplicÃ¡ndole ayuda. Pero justo aparece Rick y le espanta a tiros.

Teniendo en cuenta la inminencia de la guerra sin cuartel contra Negan, es fÃ¡cil olvidarse de este desconocido, pero ya hay importantes indicios de que podrÃ­a convertirse en un personaje importante en la trama.

A principios de aÃ±o, TVLine informÃ³ de un casting en The Walking Dead para representar a un tal "Abbud", un "carismÃ¡tico musulmÃ¡n estadounidense con los nervios, digamos, agitados, porque se las ha tenido que apaÃ±ar Ã©l solo mucho tiempo en zombilandia". El personaje misterioso de este nuevo capÃ­tulo menciona el CorÃ¡n en el diÃ¡logo que mantiene con Carl, lo que podrÃ­a confirmar que se trata de "Abbud."

Si es que ese es su verdadero nombre...

Comicbook.com ha anticipado que Abbud podrÃ­a estar basado en el personaje de cÃ³mic Siddiq, perteneciente a la comunidad de Oceanside.

Pero, recordemos, se supone que Negan matÃ³ a todos los varones de Oceanside. Si Abbud perteneciÃ³ a esa comunidad y logrÃ³ escapar, el trauma que le debiÃ³ de causar podrÃ­a explicar por quÃ© le dice a Carl eso de "yo tambiÃ©n he tenido que pasar por muchas cosas".

(Evidentemente, se trata del fin del mundo, todos han tenido que pasar por muchas cosas).

Un detalle aÃºn mÃ¡s importante es cuando ese misterioso personaje le recita a Carl un fragmento del CorÃ¡n: "Mi misericordia prevalece sobre mi ira".

MÃ¡s tarde, en uno de los saltos temporales del final del capÃ­tulo, Rick pronuncia esas mismas palabras.

(Â¿Â¡CÃ³mo!?)

HabrÃ¡ que prepararse para conocer bien a ese misterioso personaje.

Â¿A quÃ© vienen tantos saltos temporales?

HacÃ­a tiempo que se sabÃ­a que iba a haber un salto temporal importante en la serie, ya que tambiÃ©n se produce en el cÃ³mic tras la guerra con Negan y apareciÃ³ en el trÃ¡iler de la temporada 8. Sin embargo, este no es el Ãºnico salto temporal del capÃ­tulo: no para de saltar de una Ã©poca a otra. En uno de Ã©stos, Rick estÃ¡ dando un discurso; en otro, parece que ha estado llorando; en otro, se le ve muy envejecido y llevando una vida tranquila con Michonne (Danai Gurira).

Scott Gimple, el mÃ¡ximo responsable de la serie, confesÃ³ al Entertainment Weekly que algunas cosas relativas a la lÃ­nea temporal de la serie podrÃ­an ser "algo confusas". El valor de ese "algo" ya ha quedado claro.

Lo que se sabe con certeza hasta ahora es que, tras la batalla con Negan, la siguiente misiÃ³n de Rick serÃ¡ encontrar algo de tinte para sus nuevas canas.

Â¿DÃ³nde ha "aprendido" a conducir Gregory?

GENE PAGE/AMC

Antes de que Rick y los suyos desaten el caos sobre los Salvadores, se descubre que el lÃ­der de Hilltop, Gregory (Xander Berkeley) ha sometido a su comunidad a los pies de Negan. O eso cree, porque absolutamente nadie le hace caso, porque es un inÃºtil. Ahora siguen a Maggie.

El problema surge cuando el padre Gabriel (Seth Gilliam) se dispone a emprender la retirada antes de que llegue la horda de caminantes. Se da cuenta de que Gregory estÃ¡ en apuros y sale del coche para ayudarle, pero Gregory acaba tomando el coche y deja atrÃ¡s a Gabriel.

La mayor pega que se le puede poner a esta escena no tiene que ver con Gabriel (lo que hace es una estupidez). El problema es la forma de conducir de Gregory: sube al coche, mira hacia atrÃ¡s como si fuera a retroceder y lo siguiente que pasa es que el coche se mueve hacia delante.

Ese nivelazo de conducciÃ³n no es nuevo en la serie:

Greg, aprende del error de Lori Grimes (Sarah Wayne Callies). Mira por dÃ³nde vas.

Â¿Por quÃ© no aprovecha Gabriel para disparar a Negan?

AMC

Tras la huida de Gregory en su coche, el padre Gabriel intenta ponerse a salvo y acaba en un edificio o remolque cercano. El problema es que Negan tambiÃ©n se ha resguardado ahÃ­. Bueno, no, el problema es que Negan tambiÃ©n estÃ¡ ahÃ­ y Gabriel se queda parado sin hacer nada.

Negan empieza: "Espero que lleves puestos los pantalones de cagarte encima". El silencio de Gabriel parece confirmar que sÃ­ que los lleva.

Aunque puede que Gabriel no tuviera ya municiÃ³n y esta crÃ­tica no tenga fundamento. Como el resto de la temporada sea tan frenÃ©tica como han prometido los creadores y los actores de la serie, serÃ¡n los fans de la serie quienes necesiten esos pantalones, y pronto.

Este artÃ­culo fue publicado originalmente en el 'HuffPost' Estados Unidos y ha sido traducido del inglÃ©s por Daniel Templeman Sauco.
TITLE: El estreno de la octava temporada de 'The Walking Dead' deja varios misterios sin resolver

TEXT:
Bill Oâ€™Reilly says the recent New York Times report that he settled a sexual harassment suit for $32 million shortly before Fox News offered him a $100 million contract extension is â€œfalse, defamatoryâ€ and â€œanother smear article.â€

But according to Megyn Kelly, who worked alongside Oâ€™Reilly at Fox News for more than a decade, the only false claims here are coming from Oâ€™Reilly himself.

On Monday, Kelly used her new platform at NBC to accuse Oâ€™Reilly of lying.

â€œOâ€™Reillyâ€™s suggestion that no one ever complained about his behavior is false,â€ she said. â€œI know, because I complained.â€

Kelly said sheâ€™d emailed Bill Shine and Jack Abernethy, co-presidents of Fox News, about Oâ€™Reillyâ€™s alleged conduct, urging them to take action and change Foxâ€™s culture of â€œshaming women into shutting the hell up about harassment.â€

Shine pledged to deal with Oâ€™Reilly, Kelly said, but seemingly did nothing. Oâ€™Reillyâ€™s intimidation tactics allegedly continued â€• with, it seemed, the companyâ€™s blessing.

â€œThis must stop,â€ Kelly said Monday. â€œThe abuse of women, the shaming of them, the threatening and the retaliation, the silencing them after the fact â€” it has to stop.â€

â€œWomen everywhere are used to being dismissed, ignored or attacked when raising complaints about men in authority positions,â€ she went on. â€œThey stay silent so often out of fear â€• fear of ending their careers, fear of lawyers, yes, and often fear of public shaming, including through the media.â€

Fox issued a statement in response to Kelly, saying the network â€œhas taken concerted actionâ€ to change.
TITLE: Megyn Kelly Reveals She Complained To Fox News About Bill O'Reilly

Was wie eine Formalie klingt, kÃ¶nnte den nÃ¤chsten AfD-Landesverband spalten

Der rheinland-pfÃ¤lzische Landesvorstand hat versÃ¤umt, die Einladungen zum Parteitag rechtzeitig an die Mitglieder zu verschicken

Nach dem RÃ¼ckzug der AfD-Chefin Frauke Petry zeigt die Partei an immer neuen Fronten AuflÃ¶sungserscheinungen.

Der Landtagsfraktion in Sachsen und Nordrhein-Westfalen droht nach einer Austrittswelle das Aus. In Petrys Landesverband wurde gar ein Notvorstand berufen. Und nun zeigt auch die Einheit in Rheinland-Pfalz gewaltige Risse.

Schuld daran ist eine scheinbare, fast lÃ¤cherlich wirkende Formalie. Der Landesvorstand hat offenbar versÃ¤umt, die Einladung zu seinem Parteitag in Bingen am 18. November rechtzeitig an seine Mitglieder zu verschicken.

"Ein Fehler mehr"

â€œWer arbeitet macht Fehler, wer viel arbeitet macht manchmal einen Fehler mehr!â€, heiÃŸt es in einer internen Mail des Landeschefs Uwe Junge an die Mitglieder, die der HuffPost vorliegt.

Man sei â€œirrtÃ¼mlich davon ausgegangen, dass die Einladungsfrist drei Wochen betrÃ¤gtâ€ - tatsÃ¤chlich muss die Einladung zu einem ordentlichen Parteitag allerdings vier Wochen vorher erfolgen.

Junge bittet deswegen seine Mitglieder, â€œdiesen kleinen Fehler zu entschuldigen und diese Entscheidung freundschaftlich mitzutragen und am Parteitag konstruktiv, zum Wohle unseres Landesverbands, mitzuwirken.â€

Der AfD-Landschef steht mit dem RÃ¼cken zur Wand - Junge kann den Parteitag nicht verschieben. â€œEine andere LokalitÃ¤t noch in diesem Jahr zu finden wÃ¤re aussichtslosâ€, schreibt er. AuÃŸerdem muss der Parteitag noch dieses Jahr stattfinden, das schreibt die Satzung vor.

Deswegen und durch den Richtungsstreit, der in der AfD tobt, â€œkÃ¶nnten sich selbst die kleinsten Formfehler bitter rÃ¤chenâ€, sagt der Politologe Werner Patzelt von der TU Dresden.

Denn VorstÃ¤nde, die ihre formalen Pflichten nicht erfÃ¼llen, â€œmachen sich angreifbarâ€, sagt er. â€œDas machen sich interne Gegner zu Nutze, die sich in der Partei gegen die FÃ¼hrung durchsetzen wollen.â€

Auch in Rheinland-Pfalz gibt es einen rechten FlÃ¼gel, der Junge am liebsten stÃ¼rzen wÃ¼rde - er wirbt fÃ¼r eine gemÃ¤ÃŸigten Kurs, galt bis zu Petrys Weggang als Vertrauter der damaligen Parteichefin.

Weil auf dem angesetzten Parteitag auch der Landesvorstand gewÃ¤hlt werden muss, kÃ¶nnten Junges Gegner in Bingen zur offenen Revolte blasen.

Dass das mÃ¶glicherweise kurz bevorsteht, zeigte sich schon wenige Minuten, nachdem Junge die Einladung zum Parteitag verschickte.

In internen Chats sollen AfD-Mitglieder damit gedroht haben, den Parteitag â€œplatzen zu lassenâ€ - theoretisch ist jeder Beschluss aufgrund der versÃ¤umten Frist angreifbar.

"FÃ¼r eine LÃ¶sung braucht es guten Willen, den es nicht gibt"

Mit schweren VorwÃ¼rfen meldete sich auch die Landes-Vizechefin Christiane Christen zu Wort.

Sie hatte sich Mitte des Jahres aus dem Landesverband zurÃ¼ckgezogen, nachdem ihre Bewerbung auf die Spitzenkandidatur zur Bundestagswahl gescheitert war. Auch Junges FÃ¼hrungsstil hatte sie kritisiert.

In einer wÃ¼tenden Mail schrieb sie nun, dass sie die abgelaufene Frist nicht zu verantworten habe.

Mehr noch: â€œDa meine eingescannte Unterschrift OHNE MEIN WISSEN unter diesen Brief gesetzt wurde, ist mir wichtig, klarzustellen, dass ich mit dieser Einladung nichts zu tun habe und auch die abgelaufene Frist nicht verantworte. Ich bin nicht sicher, ob das schon UrkundenfÃ¤lschung ist, werde das aber prÃ¼fen lassenâ€, heiÃŸt es in der Mail, die der HuffPost vorliegt.

Wie der Landesverband aus dem Schlamassel rauskommen will, lÃ¤sst sich bislang nicht sagen.

â€œDafÃ¼r braucht es guten Willen der Mitgliederâ€, sagt Politologe Patzelt. â€œDer ist aber derzeit nicht zu erkennen.â€

Eine Anfrage der HuffPost an Junge und Christen blieb bislang unbeantwortet.

Die SPD-Fraktion hat dem AfD-Politiker Albrecht Glaser einen Brief geschrieben

Darin fordert die Fraktion ihn auf, zu umstrittenen Ã„uÃŸerungen Ã¼ber den Islam Stellung zu nehmen

Die SPD-Fraktionsspitze hat einen Brief an AfD-Politiker Albrecht Glaser geschrieben. Wie Fraktionschefin Andrea Nahles der Zeitung "Bild am Sonntag" sagte, fordern sie und FraktionsgeschÃ¤ftsfÃ¼hrer Carsten Schneider darin eine Stellungnahme zu einer Ã„uÃŸerung Glasers Ã¼ber den Islam.

Er hatte im April in einer Rede gesagt: "Wir sind nicht gegen die Religionsfreiheit. Der Islam ist eine Konstruktion, die selbst die Religionsfreiheit nicht kennt und die sie nicht respektiert. Und die da, wo sie das Sagen hat, jede Art von Religionsfreiheit im Keim erstickt. Und wer so mit einem Grundrecht umgeht, dem muss man das Grundrecht entziehen." Glaser stellt damit das von der Verfassung garantierte Recht auf Religionsfreiheit infrage.

SpÃ¤ter hatte er prÃ¤zisiert, dass er nicht einzelne Menschen gemeint habe, sondern den Islam als Religionsgemeinschaft.

Die AfD will Glaser als Vize-BundestagsprÃ¤sidenten durchsetzen

Jetzt hat die AfD Glaser als Kandidaten fÃ¼r das BundestagsprÃ¤sidium aufgestellt und will ihn auch nicht austauschen. Das Gremium besteht aus Vertretern aller Fraktionen, die Kandidaten werden vom gesamten Bundestag gewÃ¤hlt.

Die anderen Parteien haben massive Bedenken wegen Glaser. NahÂ­les sagte der Zeitung: "Wir haben beÂ­wusst darÂ­auf verÂ­zichÂ­tet, Herrn GlaÂ­ser reÂ­flexÂ­arÂ­tig abÂ­zuÂ­lehÂ­nen. Wir sollÂ­ten uns keiÂ­nen WettÂ­beÂ­werb in der AbÂ­lehÂ­nung der AfD lieÂ­fern." Daher der Brief.

Doch obwohl er schon vor zwei Wochen geschrieben wurde, hat Nahles noch keine Antwort erhalten, sagte sie. Es sei sehr befremdlich, wenn sich Glaser den Fragen anderer Fraktionen verweigere - schlieÃŸlich solle er als BundestagsvizeprÃ¤sident alle Fraktionen vertreten. "Das wiÂ­derÂ­spricht allen ReÂ­geln eines ParÂ­laÂ­ments. Gibt es keine AntÂ­wort, ist das fÃ¼r die SPD also zuÂ­sÃ¤tzÂ­lich eine klare AusÂ­saÂ­ge."

rest in peace justin bieber first tattoo, gone but never forgotten pic.twitter.com/O9xt5fyy4G â€” torrao ğŸ§™ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ (@drewinner) October 21, 2017everybody's talking about Justin Bieber 's new tattoo and i'm here wondering why the fuck there's a tv in the bathroom pic.twitter.com/JkfNtgequC â€” Bob Morley King (@Bellamy_Hero) October 21, 2017Despite one fan digging up an old interview with David Letterman where Bieber said he wouldn't "go too crazy" with tattoos, Bang Bang told 'E!'
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

Justin Bieber has shocked his fans after debuting his massive new tattoo covering his torso.

Biebs has slowly but surely been adding to his body of art (heh) but this marks one of the bigger additions to his collection. The tattoo artist who inked Bieber, Bang Bang, spoke to 'E! News' about the process and what it all meant.

"He said he has a mustache on his belly, referring to the eagle, and it just needed more around it so it wasn't so isolated and floating in the middle of his stomach... He said he wanted me to cover his front, so I sent him a bunch of options. They were all religious in subject."

Bieber showcased the finished work on his Instagram over the weekend in two posts.

A post shared by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Oct 21, 2017 at 7:37am PDT

A post shared by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Oct 21, 2017 at 7:34am PDT

The tatt features Gothic structures, demons, angelic figures and stretches across his stomach, joining up with a few of his other tattoos on his chest.

"We added two angels, one on each side," Bang Bang told 'E!'. "Whenever I do an epic piece, there needs to be the positive and negative."

"Below each of the angels, there is a demon that needs to be defeated. The skeleton on one side and the serpent on the other. It's symbolic of Gothic art and the struggle between the light and dark, the good and the evil, Yin and Yang."

The designer worked on the tattoo for three weeks, with the actual inking taking three days.

Reactions online were mixed with some fans of the 23-year-old defending his artful choices. That didn't stop the internet roasting him thoroughly.

rest in peace justin bieber first tattoo, gone but never forgotten pic.twitter.com/O9xt5fyy4G â€” torrao ğŸ§™ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ (@drewinner) October 21, 2017

everybody's talking about Justin Bieber 's new tattoo and i'm here wondering why the fuck there's a tv in the bathroom pic.twitter.com/JkfNtgequC â€” Bob Morley King (@Bellamy_Hero) October 21, 2017

Despite one fan digging up an old interview with David Letterman where Bieber said he wouldn't "go too crazy" with tattoos, Bang Bang told 'E!' he wasn't finished just yet.

"I'm coming back soon... I did the bottom half of his front but still need to do the top."
TITLE: Justin Bieber Debuts Giant Tattoo Covering His Torso

SUMMARY:
Matt Damon revealed during a wide-ranging â€œGood Morning Americaâ€ interview that he learned that Harvey Weinstein had sexually harassed Gwyneth Paltrow from her boyfriend at the time, Ben Affleck.
- Matt Damon on Harvey Weinstein pic.twitter.com/VLBR9c7nG3 â€” Good Morning America (@GMA) October 23, 2017â€œI knew the story about Gwyneth [Paltrow] from Ben [Affleck], because he was with her after Brad [Pitt], so I knew that story,â€ Damon said.
â€œBut I was working with Gwyneth with Harvey on â€˜Ripley.â€™ I never talked to Gwyneth about it.
STR New / Reuters Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law and Matt Damon in "The Talented Mr.
- George Clooney on Harvey Weinstein: https://t.co/fBSMwurc1A pic.twitter.com/1TKRNBGD2s â€” Good Morning America (@GMA) October 23, 2017
TEXT:
Matt Damon revealed during a wide-ranging â€œGood Morning Americaâ€ interview that he learned that Harvey Weinstein had sexually harassed Gwyneth Paltrow from her boyfriend at the time, Ben Affleck.

The actor weighed in on the mounting allegations of sexual assault and harassment against the disgraced Hollywood producer on the morning show Monday alongside George Clooney.

Damon, who distanced himself from Weinstein earlier this month, said he had heard about the disturbing encounter around the time he and Paltrow were filming 1999â€²s â€œThe Talented Mr. Ripley.â€

"This level of criminal sexual predation was not something I ever thought was going on." - Matt Damon on Harvey Weinstein pic.twitter.com/VLBR9c7nG3 â€” Good Morning America (@GMA) October 23, 2017

â€œI knew the story about Gwyneth [Paltrow] from Ben [Affleck], because he was with her after Brad [Pitt], so I knew that story,â€ Damon said. â€œBut I was working with Gwyneth with Harvey on â€˜Ripley.â€™ I never talked to Gwyneth about it. Ben told me.â€

â€œI knew that they had come to whatever agreement or understanding that they had come to,â€ the actor continued. â€œShe had handled it and she was the first lady of Miramax. He treated her incredibly respectfully. Always.â€

Paltrow is one of dozens of actresses whoâ€™ve come forward in recent weeks with stories of sexual misconduct involving Weinstein. The actress and entrepreneur accused him of making advances when she was 22 years old and set to star in the film â€œEmma,â€ allegedly â€œplacing his hands on herâ€ and suggesting she give him a massage in a private hotel room.

â€œHe didnâ€™t do it out in the open,â€ Damon told â€œGMA.â€ â€œIf there was ever an event where there was something I was at with Harvey in public and he was doing this thing and I missed it, and thereâ€™s some woman who was somehow assaulted and was at the Golden Globes or something and I somehow missed it, then Iâ€™m sorry.â€

Damon and Affleck have both come under fire for their close ties to Weinstein in the fallout of the scandal. Reports claimed that the â€œBourne Ultimatumâ€ actor killed an incriminating story about Weinstein back in 2004, while actress Rose McGowan, who accused the producer of rape, maintains that Affleck had prior knowledge about his behavior.

Damon has denied defending Weinstein in any capacity, while Affleck has yet to address the claims after apologizing for his own harassment scandal involving actress Hilarie Burton.

STR New / Reuters Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law and Matt Damon in "The Talented Mr. Ripley."

Apart from Paltrowâ€™s experience, Damon said he never heard about Weinsteinâ€™s â€œdarkness,â€ as the producer allegedly preyed on women in private. However, he concedes that he was more than aware of Weinsteinâ€™s infamous reputation.

â€œYou had to spend about five minutes with him to know that he was a bully and he was intimidating. That was his legend. That whole kind of M.O,â€ Damon said. â€œWhen people say â€˜everybody knew,â€™ yeah, I knew. I knew he was an a**hole. He was proud of that. Thatâ€™s how he carried himself. I knew he was a womanizer. I wouldnâ€™t want to be married to the guy, but itâ€™s not my business really, but this level of criminal sexual predation was not something I ever thought was going on.â€

Damon broke his silence on Weinsteinâ€™s alleged behavior earlier this month, condemning the producerâ€™s actions and expressing his support for the alleged victims.

â€œThis would have been a difficult past couple of days even if my name hadnâ€™t been dragged into it. I am not the story here,â€ he said. â€œThe story is these women and what happened to them. So if Iâ€™m experiencing this discomfort, it hardly bears mention. There are some real victims here and they are being incredibly brave. Hopefully, them going through this experience right now will help them heal. They are who we all should be thinking about.â€

Watch clips from the interview below.

"It's beyond infuriating." - George Clooney on Harvey Weinstein: https://t.co/fBSMwurc1A pic.twitter.com/1TKRNBGD2s â€” Good Morning America (@GMA) October 23, 2017
TITLE: Matt Damon Admits He Knew Harvey Weinstein Sexually Harassed Gwyneth Paltrow
